section_title: CONTINUING REVIEW OF THE FUNCTIONS AND OPERATIONS OF THE SECRETARIAT
sentences: This matter was first addressed by SBI on Tuesday, 7 December.
The G-77/China proposed to evaluate the geographical balance between senior staff coming from Annex I and non-Annex I Parties.
Opposed by the EU, Saudi Arabia suggested keeping this item permanently on the agenda.
Harald Dovland conducted informal consultations on the matter.
On Tuesday, 14 December, SBI adopted conclusions.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
